author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
This PR intend to fix the problem of low energy GFLASH method (see https://indico.cern.ch/event/1242712/).

because this feature is not enabled by default, no change in any WF is expected.

#### PR validation:
Private using single gamma and BT2006 setups.

<!-- Please replace this text with any link to the master PR, or the intended backport release cycle numbers -->
Will be backported to 13_0
title: Fixed low energy GFLASH
